summary: REQ-4 appears implemented: ContactPage now generates a wa.me deep link targeting siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber and formats a prefilled message containing labeled, line-broken Name/Email/Phone/Message fields with a 'Not provided' placeholder when phone is empty.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/tracking files updated (project_state.json) even though the BuildRequest only asked for frontend WhatsApp deep-link/message behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions updating project tracking/state files; this is outside REQ-4 scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Generated/summary documentation file updated (frontend-file-summaries.txt) beyond the requested WhatsApp link/message behavior change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating summary documentation artifacts.
